item.description:
"Girl's Night"!

This Month's Girl's Night:
1. Date: Saturday, November 6th at 5pm
2. Location: Jen's House in Portland (address & directions will be emailed out one week in advance)
3. Host: Jen
4. Theme: Chocolate & Cheese Fondue

Please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment when you RSVP:
1. Italian Bread (Enough to make 20 cubes)
2. French Bread (Enough to make 20 cubes)
3. Asiago Focaccia bread (can be found at Panera)
4. Fruit - Strawberries, Grapes, & Kiwi
5. Fruit - Banana's, Apples, & Pineapple
5. Vegetables - Broccoli, Snap peas, & Carrots
6. Cooked shrimp (approximately 30 cooked small/medium shrimp)
7. Marshmallows & Biscotti
8. Drinks (wine, beer, juice, etc)
9. Cheese (2-3 kinds)
11. Graham Crackers & Cookies of your choice
12. Pre-cooked potato wedges or roasted baby potatoes
13. Caramel Candies (Something like Rolo's)
14. Pretzels & Soda
15. An item of your choosing that's great in either cheese or chocolate fondue (You must specify what the item is when you RSVP)

You do not need to spend a lot on these items. Our goal is to spend less than $10 for each item.

I hope to see you there!
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Chocolate & Cheese Fondue
